mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.gongyingshang_name as gongyingshangName ,a.gongyingshang_types as gongyingshangTypes ,a.gongyingshang_content as gongyingshangContent ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段
FROM gongyingshang a
and a.gongyingshang_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.gongyingshangName},'%')
and a.gongyingshang_types = #{params.gongyingshangTypes}
and a.gongyingshang_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.gongyingshangContent},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
